name: Drim Tim
description:
Drim Tim Is a short Top Down Shooter Game, created for fun and is free to download. 

It's made to be played with a Gamepad controller. (twin stick)

Depending on the feedback received it can become a full game.

............................................................................................................. Story

You lost contact with your squad members.

Immerse yourself in the streets of a ghetto neighborhood in Eastern Europe (Romania) and find your way through hordes of cocalars. 

Your mission is to find your team members and escape the city.

............................................................................................................

Say Hello to the Cocalar!

Cocalar Definitions:

 Lower-class suburban punk 

Poorly educated young person

............................................................................................................

Disclaimer:

 No Cocalars was actually hurt or injured in the making of this Video Game!

............................................................................................................ Thank You! Have Fun!
